welcome_message_body: Welcome to Verona, the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We are delighted to have you here and we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Verona has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dane County Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at Dane County Regional Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
